con:testCase.name: TestCase_Virt_Piranha
con:testCase.con:description: Tests different response types from piranha mock service

con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:stac="http://stackservice.pa.o2.de/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <stac:getStackDetailsResponse> <!--type: virtualStack - enumeration: [RCS,BCS,PREPAID,SPAIN,HERMES]--> <virtualStack>RCS</virtualStack> <!--type: paymentType - enumeration: [POSTPAID,PREPAID]--> <paymentType>POSTPAID</paymentType> <!--type: subscriptionStatus - enumeration: [ACTIVE,DEACTIVATION_PENDING,DEACTIVATING,INACTIVE]--> <subscriptionStatus>DEACTIVATION_PENDING</subscriptionStatus> <!--type: sasName--> <sasName>10</sasName> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: brandIdType--> <brandId>100</brandId> </stac:getStackDetailsResponse> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
